SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices

Klasse PostControllerService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices.PostControllerService
@Service public class PostControllerService extends Object
This Class is the service for the PostController class. It provides methods regarding posts. The methods of the PostController are mapped on them.

  • Methodendetails

    • getPosts

      public List<Post> getPosts(String eventId)
      Returns a list with all posts of the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to get the posts from
      Gibt zurück:
      List with the posts of the event

    • getPost

      public Post getPost(String postId)
      Returns a single, specified post from the specified event.
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post
      Gibt zurück:
      the specified post

    • createPost

      public Post createPost(String eventId, String accountId, Post post, @Nullable List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> attachments)
      Creates a post in the specified id by the specified account.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to create the post in
      accountId - the id of the account which is the author of the post
      post - the post to be created
      attachments - files to add as attachment.
      Gibt zurück:
      the created post

    • updatePost

      public Post updatePost(String postId, @Nullable Post post, @Nullable List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> attachments)
      Overwrites the specified post with the given post.
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post to be overwritten
      post - the post to overwrite the old one with
      attachments - attachments to add to the post
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated post

    • createComment

      public Post createComment(String postId, String eventId, String accountId, PostComment comment)
      Creates a comment under the specified post by the specified account in the specified event.
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post in the event to create the comment under
      eventId - the id of the event with the post to create the comment under
      accountId - the id of the account which is the author of the comment
      comment - the comment to be created
      Gibt zurück:
      the post with the new comment

    • getGranted

      public boolean getGranted(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth, String eventId, List<Role> roles)
      Validate if the given Authentication matches to the given roles for the given event id.
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication to validate.
      eventId - the id of the event in which context the validation should be done.
      roles - the event roles that should match.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the given parameters match, false if not.

    • getCommentGranted

      public boolean getCommentGranted(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth, String commentId) throws ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException
      Decides if a user is the author of a comment an allowed to edit it.
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication to validate.
      commentId - the id of the comment to check for.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if user is author otherwise false.
      Löst aus:
      ExecutionControl.NotImplementedException

    • getAttachment

      public Attachment getAttachment(String attachmentId)
      Get attachment identified by an id
      Parameter:
      attachmentId - the id of the attachment
      Gibt zurück:
      the attachment or an error if something went wrong.

    • addAttachment

      public Post addAttachment(String postId, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile attachment) throws IOException
      Add an MultipartFile to an existing post.
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post to add to
      attachment - the MultipartFile to add
      Gibt zurück:
      the manipulated Post
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if the MultipartFile isn't present anymore.

    • deleteAttachment

      public void deleteAttachment(String attachmentId)
      Deletes the attachment anthe association to the post it belongs to.
      Parameter:
      attachmentId - the id of the attachment to delete.

      public void deleteComment(String commentId)
      Delete a comment and it's
      Parameter:
      commentId - the id of the comment to delete

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(String postId)
      Delete a post with all its associations
      Parameter:
      postId - the id of the post to delete
